title: ModelOutput
description: Generic model output for a scoring or decision system, including scalar and structured values.

modelOutputId.description: Stable identifier for this model output instance.

modelVersionId.description: Identifier for the model version that produced this output.

scalarValue.description: Primary scalar output, e.g., risk score in [0,1].

structuredValue.description: Optional structured representation of the model output (e.g., {"decision": "APPROVED"}).

generatedAt.description: Timestamp when the model output was generated.

requestContext.description: Domain-specific context for this model run (e.g., tenderId, supplierId, contractId).

provenanceRef.description: Identifier or URI referencing the provenance record for this model output.
